column2:
"It's so strange. Sometimes I'm overcome
with this feeling of dread, and my head...
My head starts pounding."

"Sorry... I'm fine. Really. The pain is
nothing I can't handle."

"And seeing you, I... I'm relieved. I can
stop worrying. For now, at least."

"Heh heh... Seems like my sense of doom has
a terrible track record when it comes to coming
true. You'd think that would make me worry less."

"And I know... Don't worry, I'll take it easy.
I don't want to worry you any more
than I already have."

"なんでだろう……
時々、すごく不安になって
頭も痛くなってきて……"

"ごめん……大丈夫、大丈夫だよ。
このぐらいの痛み、我慢できる。"

"それに、安心したから……
<%me>が……
無事だし。"

"ふふ……わたしのイヤな予感は
大してアテにならないってことだね。
それはそれで、悔しいけど。"

"……うん、わかってる。
きちんと休むよ、ちゃんと休む。
心配かけてばっかりはイヤだからね。"
